function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through human interaction in crowded areas such as corridors and rooms.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and outbreak if proper measures are not taken to control people flow.","Mitigation":"Implementing social distancing measures, regular disinfection of surfaces, and monitoring of people flow to control overcrowding.","Technologies":"Camera-based people counting systems, automated traffic control systems, and real-time data analysis tools for monitoring people flow.","People":"Employees, visitors, and individuals in the vicinity of the UTRC China office.","Owner":"Facility management, public health authorities, and office management."}]}
